chat.title: üí¨ Chat
chat.textInputPlaceholder: Text chat mode...Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line

api.freeVersionDesc: No registration required, select "Free Version" in Advanced Options below
api.fullVersion: Full Version (Get API Key, Using Alibaba as an example)
api.step1: Register an account on Alibaba Cloud and
api.step3: Create a new API Key and click the copy button
api.step4: Paste the API Key into the input box below
api.tip: üí° Please ensure the API Key format is correct. Service restart is required after saving.
api.tip2: üìù In personal use environment, API Key will be fully displayed for copying.
api.newbieRecommend: üéâ Newbie Recommendation: If you don't have an API Key yet, you can select "Free Version" in Advanced Options below to start using without registering any account!
api.assistApiDesc: Assist API: Handles memory management, custom voice, text chat, and Agent mode
api.aliFeature: Alibaba: Free quota available, most comprehensive features
api.glmFeature: GLM: Rate limits are extremely strict. Audio/video model has been discontinued and cannot be used as Core API
api.stepFeature: StepFun: Has free quota, very good value, but does not support Agent mode
api.openaiFeature: OpenAI: Not available in China, expensive, high intelligence level
api.siliconFeature: SiliconFlow: Has free quota, good value, limited features, only for Assist API
api.freeVersionSuggestion: Free Version: Completely free, no API Key needed, suitable for beginners (custom voice and Agent mode not supported)
api.coreApiSuggestion: Core API: Handles conversation functionality, choose based on budget and needs
api.assistApiSuggestion: Assist API: Handles text chat, memory management, custom voice, and Agent mode, only Alibaba supports custom voice
api.coreApiTitle: Core API handles voice chat functionality:
api.freeVersionCore: Free Version: Completely free, high intelligence level, supports web search, but custom voice and Agent mode not supported
api.aliCore: Alibaba: Free quota available, comprehensive features
api.glmCore: GLM: Model has been temporarily discontinued, unavailable
api.stepCore: StepFun: Completely free, high intelligence level, but rate limits are too strict, not recommended
api.openaiCore: OpenAI: Highest intelligence level, but not available in China and expensive
api.assistApiTitle: Assist API handles memory management, text chat, Agent mode, and custom voice:
api.freeVersionAssist: Free Version: Completely free, no API Key needed, but custom voice not supported
api.aliAssist: Alibaba: Recommended choice, supports custom voice and Agent mode
api.glmAssist: GLM: Memory management free, but concurrency/RPM limits are extremely strict, not recommended
api.stepAssist: StepFun: Cheap, but concurrency/RPM limits are extremely strict, not recommended
api.siliconAssist: SiliconFlow: Good value, supports Agent mode
api.assistApiNote: ‚ö†Ô∏èNote: Only Alibaba supports custom voice functionality. GLM and StepFun are not recommended.
api.assistApiKeyPlaceholder: Optional, defaults to Core API Key

coreProviderNames.free: Free Version (Catgirl Exclusive Benefit, Smartest, Supports Web Search‚ù§Ô∏è)

api.freeVersionNoApiKey: Free version does not require API Key
api.freeVersionOnlyWhenCoreFree: Free Version (Only available when Core API is Free Version)
api.freeVersionConfig: Free Version Configuration: Supports audio/video chat, text chat, and memory management. Custom voice and Agent mode not supported
api.qwenRecommendation: When Alibaba is the Core API, it's recommended to also select Alibaba as Assist API for the best custom voice experience
api.glmRecommendation: GLM's audio/video chat model GLM-Realtime has been temporarily discontinued and cannot be used as Core API
api.openaiRecommendation: When OpenAI is the Core API, it's recommended to select Alibaba as Assist API to support custom voice functionality
api.stepRecommendation: When StepFun is the Core API, it's recommended to select Alibaba as Assist API to support custom voice functionality
api.assistApiTooltipTitle: Assist API handles memory management, text chat, and custom voice:
api.freeVersionSuggestionFull: Completely free, no API Key needed, suitable for beginners (custom voice and Agent mode not supported)
api.coreApiSuggestionFull: Handles conversation functionality (choose based on budget and needs)
api.assistApiSuggestionFull: Handles memory management, text chat, and custom voice (only Alibaba supports custom voice)
api.mcpRouterTokenDescText: Authentication token for accessing MCP Router service. Required when MCP functionality is enabled. Leave empty if your MCP Router does not require authentication.
api.mcpRouterNoteBefore: For the current version, please set up
api.mcpRouterNoteAfter: on your own. This will be improved in future versions.

apiKeyChangeWarning.message: Detected that you are changing API Key. Please note the following:

api.customApiEnabledDesc: Custom API Enabled: Core API and Assist API have been disabled
api.customApiEnabledNote: Please configure APIs for each functional module in the Custom API Configuration below
api.customApiDescriptionText: These APIs are used for specific functional modules, such as summary generation, text correction, sentiment analysis, visual recognition, realtime dialogue, and speech synthesis. Each API requires separate configuration for vendor, URL, model ID, and API Key.
api.customApiWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Note: After enabling custom APIs, custom configurations below will be prioritized, while core and auxiliary APIs can still be adjusted separately.
api.enableCustomApiNote: After enabling, custom API configuration will be used, prioritized over core APIs and auxiliary APIs
api.loadProvidersFailed: Failed to load API provider options, please refresh the page and try again

realtimeWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice:
realtimeWarning.localModeOnly: ‚Ä¢ Realtime API is only for Local mode (local voice conversation)
realtimeWarning.wsProtocol: ‚Ä¢ URL must use WebSocket protocol (starting with ws:// or wss://)
realtimeWarning.autoSwitchLocal: ‚Ä¢ After configuration, the core API type will automatically switch to "local"

ttsWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice:
ttsWarning.duplexStreaming: ‚Ä¢ TTS API must support duplex streaming (full-duplex real-time speech synthesis)
ttsWarning.wsProtocol: ‚Ä¢ URL must use WebSocket protocol (starting with ws:// or wss://)
ttsWarning.cosyVoiceOnly: ‚Ä¢ Currently only supports Alibaba Cloud CosyVoice compatible protocol format

wsWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Protocol Error
